column4: Hello, i really need to see a site in IE. I'm wondering the easiest ay to go about this. Any ideas?
There are a couple ways to do this... For what reason do you need to see a site in IE?
because i'm a web developer and all i need to see my site's in the world's worst browser
You will want to go with a VirtualBox installation of Windows then. Unfortunately, you will need a Windows installation disk.
